00138 #define ADC_TRIG_SOFTWARE                       (1UL << 0)
00139 
00140 #define ADC_TRIG_MCTM0_MTO                      ((1UL << 2) | (0UL << 24) | (0UL << 16))
00141 #define ADC_TRIG_MCTM0_CH0O                     ((1UL << 2) | (1UL << 24) | (0UL << 16))
00142 #define ADC_TRIG_MCTM0_CH1O                     ((1UL << 2) | (2UL << 24) | (0UL << 16))
00143 #define ADC_TRIG_MCTM0_CH2O                     ((1UL << 2) | (3UL << 24) | (0UL << 16))
00144 #define ADC_TRIG_MCTM0_CH3O                     ((1UL << 2) | (4UL << 24) | (0UL << 16))
00145 #define ADC_TRIG_MCTM0_CH0MEV                   ((1UL << 2) | (0x18UL << 24) | (0UL << 16))
00146 #define ADC_TRIG_MCTM0_CH0DEV                   ((1UL << 2) | (0x28UL << 24) | (0UL << 16))
00147 #define ADC_TRIG_MCTM0_CH0MDEV                  ((1UL << 2) | (0x38UL << 24) | (0UL << 16))
00148 #define ADC_TRIG_MCTM0_CH1MEV                   ((1UL << 2) | (0x19UL << 24) | (0UL << 16))
00149 #define ADC_TRIG_MCTM0_CH1DEV                   ((1UL << 2) | (0x29UL << 24) | (0UL << 16))
00150 #define ADC_TRIG_MCTM0_CH1MDEV                  ((1UL << 2) | (0x39UL << 24) | (0UL << 16))
00151 #define ADC_TRIG_MCTM0_CH2MEV                   ((1UL << 2) | (0x1AUL << 24) | (0UL << 16))
00152 #define ADC_TRIG_MCTM0_CH2DEV                   ((1UL << 2) | (0x2AUL << 24) | (0UL << 16))
00153 #define ADC_TRIG_MCTM0_CH2MDEV                  ((1UL << 2) | (0x3AUL << 24) | (0UL << 16))
00154 #define ADC_TRIG_MCTM0_CH3MEV                   ((1UL << 2) | (0x1BUL << 24) | (0UL << 16))
00155 #define ADC_TRIG_MCTM0_CH3DEV                   ((1UL << 2) | (0x2BUL << 24) | (0UL << 16))
00156 #define ADC_TRIG_MCTM0_CH3MDEV                  ((1UL << 2) | (0x3BUL << 24) | (0UL << 16))
00157 
00158 #define IS_ADC_TRIG_MCTM0_CHALL(REGTRIG)        (0)
00159 
00160 #if (LIBCFG_ADC_TRIG_SRC_V2)
00161 #define ADC_TRIG_MCTM0_CHALLMEV                 ((1UL << 2) | (0x1CUL << 24) | (0UL << 16))
00162 #define ADC_TRIG_MCTM0_CHALLDEV                 ((1UL << 2) | (0x2CUL << 24) | (0UL << 16))

00164

00167                                                  (REGTRIG == ADC_TRIG_MCTM0_CHALLDEV) || \
00168                                                  (REGTRIG == ADC_TRIG_MCTM0_CHALLMDEV))

00171 #define ADC_TRIG_CMP0                           ((1UL << 4) | (0UL << 20))
00172 #define ADC_TRIG_CMP1                           ((1UL << 4) | (1UL << 20))
00173 #define ADC_TRIG_CMP2                           ((1UL << 4) | (2UL << 20))
00174 
00175 #define ADC_TRIG_BFTM0                          ((1UL << 3) | (0UL << 22) | (0UL << 19))
00176 #define ADC_TRIG_BFTM1                          ((1UL << 3) | (0UL << 22) | (1UL << 19))
00177 
00178 #define ADC_TRIG_GPTM0_MTO                      ((1UL << 2) | (0UL << 24) | (1UL << 16))
00179 #define ADC_TRIG_GPTM0_CH0O                     ((1UL << 2) | (1UL << 24) | (1UL << 16))
00180 #define ADC_TRIG_GPTM0_CH1O                     ((1UL << 2) | (2UL << 24) | (1UL << 16))
00181 #define ADC_TRIG_GPTM0_CH2O                     ((1UL << 2) | (3UL << 24) | (1UL << 16))
00182 #define ADC_TRIG_GPTM0_CH3O                     ((1UL << 2) | (4UL << 24) | (1UL << 16))
00183 
00184 #define ADC_TRIG_EXTI_0                         ((1UL << 1) | ( 0UL << 8))

00201 #define IS_ADC_TRIG(REGTRIG)                    (((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_GPTM0_MTO)     || \
00202                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_GPTM0_CH0O)    || \
00203                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_GPTM0_CH1O)    || \

00205                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_GPTM0_CH3O)    || \

00209                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_MCTM0_CH2O)    || \
00210                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_MCTM0_CH3O)    || \
00211                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_MCTM0_CH0MEV)  || \
00212                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_MCTM0_CH0DEV)  || \
00213                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_MCTM0_CH0MDEV) || \
00214                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_MCTM0_CH1MEV)  || \
00215                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_MCTM0_CH1DEV)  || \
00216                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_MCTM0_CH1MDEV) || \
00217                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_MCTM0_CH2MEV)  || \
00218                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_MCTM0_CH2DEV)  || \
00219                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_MCTM0_CH2MDEV) || \
00220                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_MCTM0_CH3MEV)  || \
00221                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_MCTM0_CH3DEV)  || \
00222                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_MCTM0_CH3MDEV) || \
00223                                                  (IS_ADC_TRIG_MCTM0_CHALL(REGTRIG))    || \
00224                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_BFTM0)         || \

00226                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_CMP0)          || \
00227                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_CMP1)          || \

00231                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_EXTI_2)        || \
00232                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_EXTI_3)        || \
00233                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_EXTI_4)        || \

00248 #define ADC_INT_SINGLE_EOC                      (0x00000001)

00254 #define ADC_INT_AWD_LOWER                       (0x00010000)
00255 #define ADC_INT_AWD_UPPER                       (0x00020000)

00296 #define ADC_AWD_DISABLE                         (u8)0x00
00297 #define ADC_AWD_ALL_LOWER                       (u8)0x05
00298 #define ADC_AWD_ALL_UPPER                       (u8)0x06
00299 #define ADC_AWD_ALL_LOWER_UPPER                 (u8)0x07
00300 #define ADC_AWD_SINGLE_LOWER                    (u8)0x01
00301 #define ADC_AWD_SINGLE_UPPER                    (u8)0x02
00302 #define ADC_AWD_SINGLE_LOWER_UPPER              (u8)0x03
00303 
00304 #define IS_ADC_AWD(AWD)                         (((AWD) == ADC_AWD_DISABLE)         || \
00305                                                  ((AWD) == ADC_AWD_ALL_LOWER)       || \
00306                                                  ((AWD) == ADC_AWD_ALL_UPPER)       || \
00307                                                  ((AWD) == ADC_AWD_ALL_LOWER_UPPER) || \
00308                                                  ((AWD) == ADC_AWD_SINGLE_LOWER)    || \
00309                                                  ((AWD) == ADC_AWD_SINGLE_UPPER)    || \
00310                                                  ((AWD) == ADC_AWD_SINGLE_LOWER_UPPER))
